attributes.action: Consider Mandatory voting For General and Local Elections.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People that refuse to vote would be fined £200.00 and the fine collected via a personal court appearance if necessary. People on state benefits that refuse to vote, would pay the £200 fine by having their benefits reduced by £4.00 per week, until the fine has been paid.
attributes.creator_name: Mr Joseph Robert Neil & Mrs Margaret James.
